thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: Jacinta

author: Jacinta
title: Jacinta
text:
Have used this site for several housemate changes over the years and always find someone great. Would definitely recommend the paid options (as much as I'd love not to!) as they really speed up the process being able to access messaging with any users. Of course it's always luck of the draw with who is looking at the time you need though!
Great to be able to keep messages on file. Still have those from years and years ago to refer to if I ever needed to.
Would be great to have an app available, to be able to manage what email notifications you get and to filter by a few more things in the advanced search options.
